writeFile.text:
Installation Summary ------------------------
SugarCRM was installed with the following settings
Installation directory: ${installdir}/ Apache HTTP port: ${webport} Apache HTTPS port: ${sslport} MySQL port: ${dbport}
On Linux and OSX systems: To start SugarCRM: ${installdir}/sugarctl.sh start To stop SugarCRM: ${installdir}/sugarctl.sh stop
To access SugarCRM, point your browser to: http://${domainname}:${webport}/sugarcrm/
To access SugarCRM with SSL, point your browser to: https://${domainname}:${sslport}/sugarcrm/

@echo off ${installdir.dos}\mysql\bin\mysql.exe --defaults-file="${installdir.dos}\mysql\my.ini" -u root -e "UPDATE mysql.user SET Password=old_password('${rootpassword}') WHERE User='root';" ${installdir.dos}\mysql\bin\mysql.exe --defaults-file="${installdir.dos}\mysql\my.ini" -u root -e "UPDATE mysql.user SET Password=old_password('${rootpassword}') WHERE User='';" ${installdir.dos}\mysql\bin\mysql.exe --defaults-file="${installdir.dos}\mysql\my.ini" -u root -e "FLUSH PRIVILEGES;"
